select t.id, t.name, "AI" type, coalesce(ai.scan_value,0.0) scan_value, rtt.code from rel_tag_tag rtt join tag t on rtt.child_tag_id = t.id join analog_input ai on ai.tag_id = rtt.child_tag_id where rtt.parent_tag_id = #{param1} union select t.id, t.name, "DI" type, coalesce(di.scan_value,0.0) scan_value, rtt.code from rel_tag_tag rtt join tag t on rtt.child_tag_id = t.id join digital_input di on di.tag_id = rtt.child_tag_id where rtt.parent_tag_id = #{param1} order by code
